snippet: The Pearl Theater Company has pushed back the spring premiere of Terrence McNally’s “And Away We Go” to the fall season.
abstract: Pearl Theater Company pushes back spring premiere of Terrence McNally’s And Away We Go to the fall season due to budgetary problems.
lead_paragraph: The Pearl Theater Company has pushed back the spring premiere of Terrence McNally’s “And Away We Go” to the fall season.

headline.main: Pearl Theater Company Delays McNally Play
headline.print_headline: Pearl Theater Company Delays McNally Play
